metadata.title: CVE-2024-49215 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Rejected reason: DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs:CVE-2023-49294. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate ofCVE-2023-49294. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2023-49294instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in thiscandidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
